title: Pixel 2 Uninstall App Weirdness ?
content:
When I go to install an app from my apps screen (::: button on home screen) I long press on the app which pops up two options:

App info and uninstall 

I swipe or tap uninstall and the screen exits back to home but doesn't uninstall the app. I am able to uninstall from app info but not the uninstall swipe. 

It's an annoying extra step to have to take to go to app info. 

Android Version 9 all updates installed. Anyone else having this issue? 

It also won't uninstall from the home screen  either.
